data: Ruth Chabay, Ph.D. Ruth Chabay, Ph.D. Professor 940-565-3251 ruth.chabay@unt.edu Physics Building - 007 https://ruthchabay.net/ My field is Physics Education Research, one of the newest subfields of physics. Currently, my research focuses on the challenges involved in integrating computational modeling into the physics curriculum at all levels, including the introductory level.
